**Preface to the *Four Hundred Characters on Golden Elixir* with Annotations by Lü Xīxīng**
*Composed by Zhang Zǐyáng Zhēnrén of Song Tiāntái, Annotated by Lü Xīxīng of the Ming*

The **Seven Refunds and Nine Returns Golden Elixir**—seven denotes the number of fire, nine the number of metal.
To refine metal with fire, returning to the origin and restoring the essence, is called **Golden Elixir**.
Divide the body and mind into upper and lower strings,
Distinguish the spirit-*qi* at the winter and summer solstices,
Align the form and spirit with the **Kàn-Lí** (water-fire) hexagrams.
Gather the five phases:
East—**arcanum** (hún, soul) of wood,
West—**pò** (corporeal essence) of metal,
South—**shén** (spirit) of fire,
North—**jīng** (essence) of water,
Center—**yì** (intent) of earth.
Thus, the five phases converge.

To **contain the luminous gaze**, **condense the resonant breath**,
**harmonize the nasal breath**, **seal the tongue’s *qi***—
this is the **unification of the four symbols**.

When the eyes do not see yet the *arcanum* abides in the liver,
When the ears do not hear yet the essence resides in the kidneys,
When the tongue does not speak yet the spirit dwells in the heart,
When the nose does not scent yet the *pò* lingers in the lungs,
When the limbs do not move yet the intent rests in the spleen—
this is called **Five *Qi* Returning to the Primordial**.

Refine essence into *qi*,
Refine *qi* into spirit,
Refine spirit into the **Void**—
thus it is called **Three Flowers Converging at the Crown**.

When the *arcanum* is in the liver yet does not leak through the eyes,
When the *pò* is in the lungs yet does not leak through the nose,
When the spirit is in the heart yet does not leak through the mouth,
When the essence is in the kidneys yet does not leak through the ears,
When the intent is in the spleen yet does not leak through the orifices—
this is called **Leakless**.

Essence, spirit, *arcanum*, *pò*, and intent
intermingle and coalesce into one *qi*,
Invisible, inaudible, nameless—
thus it is called **Primordial Void**.

Refining essence means refining **Primordial Essence**—
not the lustful essence from carnal indulgence.
Refining *qi* means refining **Primordial *Qi***—
not the breath inhaled through mouth and nose.
Refining spirit means refining **Primordial Spirit**—
not the mental projections of heart and mind.
Thus, this **spirit, *qi*, and essence**
share the same root as Heaven and Earth,
the same body as all things.
Obtain them and live; lose them and die.

Refine with **yang fire**, and it becomes **yang *qi**;
Nourish with **yin符 (talisman)**, and it becomes **yin essence**.
Thus it is said:
*Perceived, it cannot be used;
Used, it cannot be perceived.*

The body is the **dwelling of the heart**;
The heart is the **sovereign of the body**.
When the heart rages like a dragon,
The body becomes fierce as a tiger.
Within the body lies a point of **true yang *qi***;
Within the heart lies a point of **true yin essence**.
Thus it is called **Two Substances**.

The heart belongs to **Kàn (water)**;
The body belongs to **Kūn (earth)**—
thus it is called the **Kàn-Kūn Cauldron**.

**Yang *qi*** belongs to **Lí (fire)**;
**Yin essence** belongs to **Kàn (water)**—
thus it is called **Wu-Tù (Tortoise-Hare) Medicine**.

Embrace the One, guard the Center,
Refine the Primordial, nourish the Substantial—
thus it is called **Harvesting the Primordial Mixed-Essence *Qi***.

Morning **Zhèn (thunder, ☳)**, evening **Méng (darkness, ☴)**,
Noon **Dù (midday, ☲)**, midnight **Zǐ (child, ☉)**—
thus it is called **Circulating the Fire of the Heavenly Cycle**.

Wood’s **liquid** thrives at **Mǎo (3–5 AM)**,
Metal’s **essence** thrives at **Yǒu (5–7 PM)**—
thus one must **bathe**.

**Zhèn (thunder, ☳)**-male drinks **west wine**,
**Duì (lake, ☱)**-female plucks **north blossoms**,
**Xùn (wind, ☴)**-wind stirs the six yangs,
**Kūn (earth, ☷)**-soil conceals the seven numbers—
thus one must **draw and supplement**.

At the onset of gathering medicine,
One moves the **Kàn-Kūn (water-earth) latchkey**,
Extracts the **Kàn-Lí (water-fire) blade and pill**.
Initially, like clouds filling a thousand peaks,
Then like the moon embracing ten thousand waters—
naturally like the **tortoise and serpent’s union**,
Like the **ox and horse’s pacing**.

The **Dragon contends for the *arcanum***,
The **Tiger contends for the *pò***,
The **Crow battles for essence**,
The **Hare battles for spirit**—
In the **dim haze**, true **lead** appears;
In the **obscure void**, true **mercury** emerges.

With **Yellow Nurse** as matchmaker,
Guarded in the **Central Palace**.
Lead meets fire and **ascends**,
Mercury meets fire and **flees**.
Thus, with **Non-Being as oil**, it is blended,
And with **Nameless Crude**, it is **settled**.
Lead returns to the **Kūn Palace**,
Mercury returns to the **Kàn Position**—
True earth merges, **luminous and silent**.

Excessive fire causes **dryness**,
Excessive water causes **overflow**—
Dryness and overflow must be **regulated**,
Hence the **scales and measures**.

At this stage of cultivation:
The **cinnabar field** generates wind,
The **vermilion palace** shines with moon,
The **elixir field** blazes with fire,
The **grain sea** ripples clear,
The **spine’s groove** resembles a chariot wheel,
The limbs become like mountains,
The pores open as after bathing,
The bones and vessels relax as in deep sleep,
The spirit unites like husband and wife,
The *arcanum* and *pò* cling like mother and child—
This is the **true realm**, not metaphor.

Refine with **scales and measures**,
And it **congeals without dispersing**.
Refine with **weights and balances**,
And it **coalesces ever firmer**.
The *arcanum* is hidden, the *pò* is extinguished,
Essence condenses, spirit solidifies—
One intent harmonizes, the flesh becomes **luminous and transparent**.
Day by day, hour by hour,
It **gradually congeals and gathers**,
From **formlessness to form**,
Structuring the **Sacred Embryo**.

A year has **twelve months**,
A month has **thirty days**,
A day has **one hundred *kè* (quarter-hours)**.
A month totals **three thousand *kè***,
Ten months total **thirty thousand *kè***.
In **sitting, standing, walking, resting**,
It persists **unbroken**.

Once the **embryonic *qi*** congeals,
The **infant form** manifests,
The **dark pearl** takes shape,
**Taiyi** embraces the **True**.
Within **thirty thousand *kè***,
One can **seize the thirty thousand years** of Heaven.
How so?
Each *kè* contains a **year’s seasonal shifts**.
Thus, **thirty thousand *kè*** can **seize thirty thousand years**.
Hence, a year’s **twelve months** total **thirty-six thousand**.

Even the **foolish commoner**, practicing this,
Instantly ascends to the **Sacred Realm**.
Yet the masses, in their daily lives,
Unknowingly **lose their Primordial Essence**,
**exhaust their Primordial *Qi***,
**sever their Primordial Spirit**.
Thus, every *kè* must be **harmonized**.
If even one *kè* is amiss,
The **medicinal materials decay**,
The **fire’s timing falters**.
Thus it is said:
*A hair’s breadth of deviation—no elixir is made.*
Therefore, one must **attend to each *kè***,
Yet do so **without effort**.

True *qi* congeals, the Primordial Spirit expands.
Internally, one refines **thirty thousand *kè*** of elixir in a year;
Externally, one **seizes thirty thousand years**.
On a grand scale, one **forms a fetus** of **thirteen thousand five hundred breaths** in a day;
On a small scale, one **circulates eighty-four thousand *lǐ*** in twelve *shí* (two-hour periods).

「Therefore, it is said: **Seize the Yang** of a single point from Heaven and Earth,
And **harvest the Qi** of the two wheels of Sun and Moon.

**Circulate the True Water** in the Lead Furnace,
And **move the True Fire** in the Mercury Tripod.

When Lead encounters Mercury,
It is called the **Flowering Pool**.
When Mercury enters Lead,
It is called **Divine Water**.

One must not **cling to inaction**,
Nor **manifest in overt action**,
Nor **fixate on visualization**,
Nor **obsessionally adhere to retention**,
Nor **sit in vain and lose resolve**,
Nor **practice blindly and refine recklessly**.

**True Earth subdues True Lead**,
And **True Lead restrains True Mercury**.
When Lead and Mercury **return to True Earth**,
The body and mind **become still and unmoved**.

The Dao of the Golden Elixir
Has no other principle than Lead, Mercury, and Earth—
Lead is the **True Water of Metal**,
Mercury is the **True Fire of Wood**.

The methods of the Elixir **reverse the Five Phases** to achieve wondrous effects,
Thus, Earth **subdues Lead**,
And Lead **restrains Mercury**,
**Devouring and being devoured**,
All **die and return to the thick Earth**,
And only then does the Golden Elixir **begin to take form**.

**True Earth** refers to the **Earth of the Self**.
The Master of Upper Yang said:
*"To **subdue Water** and seek Lead with the **Earth of the Self**—this is correct.
For the **Qi of True Lead** is concealed within the **Gate of the Twenty-Eight**,
And I **ride its movement** to take it.
If there is no **Earth of the Self**,
Then the **resonance and response** will be misaligned,
And the **medicinal material** will never be obtained.*

The **true adept** must **discern and extract the True Mind** here.
When the **True Mind** issues forth a **True Intent**,
**Twisting and probing** it,
**Searching and refining** it,
**Nurturing it with gentleness**,
This is the **pith and marrow**—
As the *Paramartha Contract* says:
*"**Embrace the subtle and profound**,
**Unfold and reveal the treasure**."*

This is the **essential key** to seeking Lead.

Yet, when it is called **True**,
It is taken in the sense of **unadulterated and pure**.
If Lead is **True Lead** but Earth is not **True Earth**,
Then **True cannot contain True**,
And **impurity cannot align with the Dao**.

When the **medicinal material is obtained** and **returned to the Tripod**,
It is the **Mercury of my own Yin**,
Naturally **subdued and controlled**,
**Summoning Lead** yet **neither scattering nor fleeing**—
For what reason?
Fire is extinguished by Water,
Wood is subdued by Metal—
These are the **natural ways** of no great wonder.

The *Paramartha Contract* states:
*"When Water is excessive, Fire is extinguished—annihilation.
All return to the thick Earth."*

The **wondrous interplay of the Five Phases** is such:
Water meets Earth and is **smothered**,
Fire meets Earth and is **concealed**.
All things **cannot be born without Earth**,
Thus the Elixir method **culminates in returning to Earth**.

**Nourishing the Holy Fetus**,
**Perfecting the Elixir**,
Has no other path than this.
Yet when **returning to Earth**,
The body and mind **both become still and unmoved**—
For the **body and mind** are the **two strings** of **Yin and Yang Qi**,
As the *Canon* says:
*"Divide the body and mind into upper and lower,
The two strings are the Dao of the Golden Elixir—
**Movement** is its **function**,
**Stillness** is its **substance**.
When **still and unmoved**, it is **stillness**—
Thus, from here onward, the **mysteries of returning to stillness** are spoken of."*

**Emptiness and Nothingness** generate **White Snow**,
**Stillness and Quietude** sprout **Yellow Sprouts**.
The **Jade Furnace** warms with **gentle Fire**,
The **Golden Tripod** ascends **Purple Mist**.

**Emptiness and stillness**—
The **peak of immobility**—
**"White Snow"** and **"Yellow Sprouts"** are both **alternate names for the Elixir**.
For **"White Snow"** is the **essence of Yin**,
And **"Yellow Sprouts"** are the **emerging vitality of Lead**,
As the *Paramartha Contract* says:
*"Yin Fire is white,
Yellow Sprouts are Lead."*

When the body and mind are **still and unmoved**,
The Elixir resides in the **Central Palace**,
And only **harmonious Qi** of spring warmth is seen—
**Vitality and movement** flourish abundantly,
Like **White Snow** drifting in the **void**,
Like **Yellow Sprouts** bursting from the **soil**.
At this time, the **refinement of Fire** must not be too **dry**,
But should **nurture it gently**,
And **preserve it softly**.

As our **Holy Master** spoke:
*"The Elixir furnace of the River East rests in **tranquility**,
The **Fetus of the Crane** and the **Breath of the Tortoise** naturally **soften**."*

As for the **mists ascending the Tripod**,
It is the **Yang Light striking the crown**—
A metaphor for **external Elixir** using the **furnace’s fire**,
Easily understood.

**Flowering Pool blooms the Lotus**,
**Divine Water** stirs **Golden Waves**.
The night is deep, the moon is bright and clear—
**Heaven and Earth** as a **single wheel of mirror**.

**Flowering Pool** and **Divine Water** have many interpretations.
An ancient verse says:
*"The **foundation of life** lies only in the **Golden Flowering Pool**."*
Now, applying the words of **enlightenment**,
**"Flowering Pool blooms the Lotus"** refers to the **virgin maiden’s first bloom** in the **Northern Land**.
**"Divine Water"** is the **True Mercury of the Self**.
**"Golden Waves"**—
The **ultimate clarity of water and stillness**.

**"The night is deep, the moon is bright and clear"**—
At the **midnight hour**, the **moonlight shines** in the **Northern Sea**.
**"Deep night"** is the **juncture of Hài and Zǐ**,
The **time of the Winter Solstice**.
**"Heaven and Earth as a single wheel of mirror"**—
The **peak of luminous purity**.

For the **medicinal material** must first **be rich in Qi** before it is **born**,
And **still and settled** before it is **harvested**.
When the **Metal Essence is robust and flourishing**,
And the **Moon’s Radiance** is **clear and pure**,
The **Golden Lotus** half-unfolds,
The **Elixir Sprout** is fresh and new.
To **harvest it at this moment**,
One must **guard it with serenity**,
And **prioritize it with non-contention**—
This is called **clear water and pure waves**,
And only then can it **reflect all phenomena**,
And the **Pearl of the Tortoise** be obtained.

Otherwise, if there is **disturbance within**,
The **essence will scatter**,
And **calamity, regret, and remorse** will arise from it,
And the **medicinal material** will never be obtained.

**Cinnabar refines the Yang Qi**,
**Quick-silver cooks the Metal Essence**.
The **Metal Essence** and the **Yang Qi**—
**Cinnabar** and **Quick-silver**—
Are both **alternate names for the Elixir**.
When speaking of **"Cinnabar"**, it is the **Yang Qi** being refined.
When speaking of **"Quick-silver"**, it is the **Metal Essence** being cooked.
For the Elixir **relies on Fire** to transform,
Thus, in the **twelve double-hours**,
When **Yang Fire** refines it,
It becomes **Yang Qi**.
And **"Cinnabar"** is where the **Yang Qi** **congeals**.
When **Yin Symbols** nurture it,
It becomes **Yin Essence**.
And **"Quick-silver"** is where the **Yin Essence** **forms**.
Yet the **Metal Essence** and the **Yang Qi** are **one and the same**.

Thus, it is summarized:
*"The **Metal Essence** and the **Yang Qi**—
**Cinnabar** and **Quick-silver**."*

Now it is known:
**One substance in two forms**,
Which cannot be **clearly divided** into two—
Only **according to the Fire and Symbols** does it **shift**.

The sequence states:
*"When refined by Yang Fire, it becomes Yang Qi;
When nurtured by Yin Symbols, it becomes Yin Essence."*
This is its intent.

◎ The **Sun’s soul** is the **fat of the Jade Rabbit**,
The **Moon’s shadow** is the **marrow of the Golden Crow**.
When gathered into the **Cauldron**, they merge as **one pool of water**.
For the **precise essences of Yin and Yang** intermingle within,
Thus it is said: *"The soul"*—the **essence of the Great Yang**—
Is the **fat of the Jade Rabbit**, the **central line of Kan**,
Which is **true lead**.

The **Moon’s shadow**—the **substance of Great Yin**—
Is the **marrow of the Golden Crow**, the **central line of Li**,
Which is **true mercury**.

Thus, the **two medicines of Crow and Rabbit**,
When gathered into the **Cauldron**, dissolve into **water**,
And become the **Golden Elixir**.
As the *Paramartha Agreement* says:
*"Dissolving into water, the horse-tooth lapis."*

Indeed, the **medicine’s origin** knows no greater than **one breath ascending from the steamer-mountain**,
Then transforming into **water**—first as **liquid**, then congealing—
And thus the **Returning Elixir** is complete.
All texts speak of **Jade Nectar and Sweet Dew**,
**Bathing the Crown with Curdled Milk**—
None exceed this.

◎ The **medicine’s birth** lies in the **Mysterious Aperture**,
The **fire’s timing** ignites the **Yang Furnace**.
When **Dragon and Tiger** cease their union,
The **Treasure Cauldron** births the **Mysterious Pearl**.

As above, the **medicine and fire’s timing** have been clearly expounded.
The **Immortal Sage** feared others might not grasp their **interaction**,
Thus further revealing this **one aperture**.
Its meaning is already seen in the sequence:

*"Within the body, there is one aperture called the **Mysterious Female**—
Not the heart, not the kidneys,
Not the mouth or nose,
Not the spleen or stomach,
Not the anal passage or bladder,
Nor the **Elixir Field** or **Mud Ball**.
To know this **one aperture** is to know the **Winter Solstice** within,
The **medicine** within,
The **fire’s timing** within,
The **bathing** within,
The **gestation** within,
The **shedding of the body** within.

This **one aperture** has no boundaries, no inside or outside—
It is the **root of spirit-qi** and the **valley of emptiness**.
Thus, seeking it within the body,
One must not seek it elsewhere."*

Such instruction is concise yet exhaustive.

◎ This **aperture** is no ordinary one—
It is the **union of Heaven and Earth**, formed together.
Named the **Spirit-Qi Cavity**,
Within it dwell the **essences of Kan and Li**.

*"Someone asks: What are the **medicines**?
The **medicine** is the **true Yin-Yi qi of Kan**—**true lead**.
The **substance** is the **long-accumulated essence of Li**—**true mercury**."*

The *Dao De Jing* says:
*"Faint and indistinct, yet within it lies the **substance**."*
This refers to the **substance**.

*"Dark and obscure, yet within it lies the **essence**.
Its essence is most true, within it lies the **verity**."*
This refers to the **medicine**.

The **medicine and substance** arise from the **dark and indistinct**,
Yet it is said they arise from the **Mysterious Aperture**—
For the **dwellings of Yin and Yang** hold their **true essences** intermingled.
At this time, **Dragon and Tiger** have not yet united,
The **Mysterious Female** has not yet formed.
Thus, they still belong to **two families**.
Once gathered in one place,
The **spirit-qi** naturally returns to its **root**,
And within the **void**, this **one aperture**—the **Mysterious Female**—emerges.
Within it, the **medicine and substance** grow daily and monthly,
Until at **three hundred cycles**, the **transformation is complete**—
**gestation, shedding the body, divine metamorphosis**—
All stem from this.
Thus it is said: *"Gestation is here, shedding the body is here."*

When asked why the **fire’s timing** and **Winter Solstice** are within,
It is said: *"The **fire’s timing** is the **circuit of Heaven’s numbers**,
The **surrounding revolutions** are all within this place.
The **Winter Solstice** is here—from **obscurity to dawn**,
When **Thunder arrives to receive the Symbols**,
The **Yang Furnace** ignites—
All occur within this.
Yet this is not the **Winter Solstice** of others.
Thus it is said: *‘Seek it within the body, not elsewhere.’*
The **Immortal Sage’s words** carry deep meaning—
Saying *‘seek it within’* teaches one to **first recognize it in the body**,
Saying *‘not elsewhere’* shows that **seeking it elsewhere** is also possible at times."

◎ **One point of Wood Mercury** glows red,
**Four catties of Gold Lead** are black.
When **Lead and Mercury** coalesce into a **pearl**,
It shines **bright and wondrous—wisteria gold**.

**Wood Mercury** is the **spirit of the previous cycle’s mercury**,
With not even a **dram’s weight**, hence *"one point."*
The **Upper Yang Master** said:
*"Take a **nearby true mercury** to welcome it."*
**Gold Lead** is the **true Yin-Yi water of Kan**,
From which **gold is born in water**, hence *"day-gold lead."*
Speaking of **three catties** means **forty-eight taels**.
Each **tael of true lead** weighs **three chins**—
Totaling **one hundred forty-four chins**,
The **strategy number of Kun**.

For **Gold Lead’s** complete form remains unbroken,
Its **chins and taels** are whole—
Thus this count.
**Cinnabar** is another name for the **Returning Elixir’s Golden Liquid**.
**Wisteria** is the color of **red and black combined**.
The *Paramartha Agreement* says:
*"Its hue shifts to wisteria, then **brightly becomes the Returning Elixir**."*
**Bright and wondrous** is the same as *"brightly."*
The **Golden Elixir** is the **substance without substance**,
Not to be sought by **form or appearance**.
The **Immortal Sage**, through **prescriptions and symbols**, reverses the analogy to guide others—
The intent lies beyond the **words and meaning**.
If one insists on seeking the so-called *"bright wisteria gold"*
Before calling it **Elixir**, then such a person speaks in **dreams**,
Far from the truth.

◎ The **homestead’s scenery** is splendid,
**Spring rains** deepen as the **wind blows**.
Plowing and hoeing require **no effort**—
The **entire earth turns to gold**.

*"The **homestead**" refers to the **body within**.
*"Splendid scenery"* means the **medicine is complete**.
*"Spring rains"* and *"wind"* signify the **fire’s timing is sufficient**.

When the **medicine is gathered into the Cauldron**,
And one **embraces unity**, **abiding in the center**—
All must be **harmonized with the Oil of Non-Action**,
**Settled by the Nameless Pebble**—
Thus, though there is **plowing and hoeing**, no **labor is spent**.
When the **work is complete** and the **medicine transforms**,
The **entire earth becomes gold**.
The **earth** also refers to **the body**.
As when **blood turns to white grease**,
**Bones become jade and alabaster**,
**Yin is exhausted, Yang is pure**,
**Form and substance are altered**—
A **golden body of sixteen feet**,
**Unspoiled for ten thousand kalpas—**
How could this be empty words?

「One version reads *"not exhausting labor"* (不废力), meaning one does not neglect its work. Yet, considering the sense of *"using without strain"* (用之不勤) and *"difficult to exhaust with toil"* (难以愁劳), the reading *"not expending"* (不费) is superior.

◎ **True Lead (真铅)** is born in **Kan (坎)**, its use lies in the **Li Palace (离宫)**.
With black turning to red, a single cauldron’s **qi** becomes dense.
This refers to the **land where the medicine is produced** and the **place where it is used**.
**True Lead** born in **Kan** means **gold is produced from water**, and its use in the **Li Palace** is to subdue **Mercury (汞)**.
The **elixir method** uses black to invest red—at this moment, the **True Qi (真气)** ascends and descends, fusing the essence like **mist rising from mountains and lakes**.
Yet the *"initial dense clouds filling the thousand mountains"* (初时云满千山) in the sequence hints at this very stage.

◎ **True Mercury (真汞)** is produced in **Li (离)**, its use however returns to **Kan (坎)**.
A **lovely maiden (姹女)** passes through the **Southern Garden (南园)**, holding a **jade olive (玉橄榄)**.
**True Mercury** produced in **Li** means **fire generates the southern realm**, and its use in **Kan** is to seek **Lead (铅)**.
The **lovely maiden** is **Mercury**, the **Southern Garden** its native domain; *"passing through the Southern Garden"* means departing from its own southern realm.
Departing from the **Southern Garden**, traveling to the **western neighbor** (西邻), then **they contend and support each other**, and the **Dark Pearl (玄珠)** manifests its form.
**Jade olive (玉橄榄)** is another name for the **Dark Pearl**.
Olives are **bitter yet sweet**—taking this to illustrate is most clear and apt.

◎ **Zhen (震)** and **Dui (兑)** are neither east nor west,
**Kan (坎)** and **Li (离)** are neither south nor north.
The **Big Dipper’s handle (斗柄)** traverses the **Celestial Cycle (周天)**,
Its essence lies in **human gathering and compression (攒簇)**.»

The **Zhen (震)** and **Dui (兑)**, **Kan (坎)** and **Li (离)**—these are the four **symbols (象)** of the **Dao (道)**.
East, west, south, north—these are the four **symbols'** positions (位)**.
When crafting the **elixir (丹)**, gather and compress the **Five Phases (五行)**, harmonize the four **symbols**, and return them to the **Central Palace (中宫)**, then east, west, south, and north blend into one.
Thus, **Metal (金)** does not dwell in the west,
**Wood (木)** does not dwell in the east,
**Fire (火)** does not dwell in the south,
**Water (水)** does not dwell in the north.
When neither **hexagram (卦)** nor **trigram (爻)** exists, nor their respective positions,
and one forgets form and obscures symbol,
it cannot be sought or questioned—
yet it is named the **elixir (丹)**.
But its essence lies in using the **Big Dipper’s handle (斗柄)** to traverse the **Celestial Cycle (周天)**,
with **Fire’s conditions (火侯)** fully observed,
then the blending and compression may be achieved.

For the **Celestial Cycle (周天)** is governed by the **Big Dipper (北斗)**, which distributes the **original qi (元气)**.
As the **Celestial Cycle** revolves, the **Five Qi (五气)** flow in sequence, completing the year’s work.
Humans also possess this.
If one cannot *"observe the Dao of Heaven (观天之道), grasp Heaven’s movements (执天之行)"*,
and instead seeks the **human gathering and compression (攒簇)**—the **so-called Celestial Pivot (辰极)**—
how can one compress and blend to produce the **true elixir of immortality (真乙之丹)**?

◎ **Fire’s conditions (火侯)** do not require set times,
nor does the **winter solstice (冬至)** necessarily fall on **zi hour (子)**.
In the **bathing method (沐浴法)**, at **mao (卯)** and **you (酉)** hours, the **empty comparison (虚比)** occurs.
For the **elixir’s Fire’s conditions (金丹火侯)**,
the twelve hours from **zi (子)** onward are **yang (阳)**,
and the twelve hours from **wu (午)** onward are **yin (阴)**.
When **hai (亥)** and **zi (子)** hours meet,
one **yang** returns—this is called the **winter solstice (冬至)**.
In the months of **mao (卯)** and **you (酉)**,
**Wood (木)** and **Metal (金)** qi flourish,
and the **bathing method (沐浴)** should be applied.
At this point, the **principles of yin and yang (阴阳之定理)** and the **numbers of transformation (造化之成数)**
must not differ by even a hair’s breadth.
Yet though the **method (法)** is fixed,
the **principles (理)** are boundless and flexible—
its subtleties lie in the practitioner’s mind.
Thus, the **administration of medicines (入药)** and the **ignition of fire (起火)** have their own advances and retreats;
one need not adhere strictly to **zi (子)** and **wu (午)** hours.
When **Zhen (震)** arrives and receives its **talisman (符)**,
there is **true faith (真信)**—
not confined to the month of **zi (子)**.
When bathing in the **elixir’s Fire’s conditions (金丹)**,
at the proper time and season,
it is not confined to **mao (卯)** and **you (酉)** months.
The **medicine administration (入药)** states:
*"Within one day, twelve hours;
Where the mind reaches, all may be done."*
It also says:
*"At the initial embryo formation, examine one’s natal **command (本命)**;
At the final **shedding of the mortal frame (脱胎)**, observe the **four cardinal directions (四正)**."*
This fully elucidates the matter.

◎ **Crow’s liver (乌肝)** and **rabbit’s marrow (兔髓)**—
when seized, they are found in one place.
One **elixir grain (一粒)** follows another,
from the subtle to the manifest.
**Crow’s liver (乌肝)** and **rabbit’s marrow (兔髓)** are the **essence of Kan and Li (坎离之精)**;
they must be seized and returned to one place
before the **golden elixir (金丹)** can be formed.
When **Fire’s conditions (火)** traverse the **Celestial Cycle (周天)**,
and the work is complete after **three hundred days (三百)**,
this is called **one grain per day (日复一粒)**—
from the subtle to the manifest.
The **embryo (婴儿)** reveals its form,
and the **shedding of the mortal frame (脱胎)** achieves **spiritual transformation (神化)**.

◎ **Chaos (混沌)** embraces the **void (虚空)**,
the **void** encompasses the **Three Realms (三界)**.
Yet when seeking its roots,
one finds a **grain of millet (黍米)** in size.
The **Three Realms (三界)**—the **Realm of Desire (欲界)**, the **Realm of Form (色界)**, and the **Realm of Formlessness (无色界)**—
all are contained within the **void (虚空)**,
and **Chaos (混沌)** embraces them.
**Chaos (混沌)** is the **preheaven undifferentiated (先天无极)**.
When the **elixir method (丹法)** returns the **spiritual qi (神气)** to its root,
the **void (虚无)** gives rise to **orifices (生窍)**,
and within the **formless (无质)** arises **sacred substance (灵质)**—
this is the **void** encompassing the **Three Realms**.
After **shedding of the mortal frame (脱胎)**,
all return to the **void (虚无)**,
to **Chaos (混沌)**,
and are then called **accomplished (了当)**—
this is **Chaos** embracing the **void**.
Yet when seeking the **foundation of one’s life (立命之根源)**,
it is still just a **grain-sized Dark Pearl (一黍玄珠)**,
from the subtle to the manifest.
For the **grain of millet (黍米)**,
it is the **having within the none (无中之有)**;
when **shedding of the mortal frame (脱胎)** achieves **spiritual transformation (神化)**,
it returns once more to the **none (无)**—
then the **sage (圣人)** is beyond knowing,
and the **Way (道)** is truly united.

◎ When **Heaven (天)** and **Earth (地)** interact, **true fluid (真液)** emerges;
when **Sun (日)** and **Moon (月)** contain **true essence (真精)**.
If one grasps the **foundation of Kan and Li (坎离基)**,
then the **Three Realms (三界)** return to one body.
**Heaven (天)** and **Earth (地)** are the **body of yin and yang’s union (阴阳配合之体)**,
while **Sun (日)** and **Moon (月)** are the **essence of yin and yang’s mutual concealment (阴阳互藏之精)**.
When **Heaven (天)** and **Earth (地)** interact,
the **Sun (日)** and **Moon (月)**’s essences merge—
**true essence (真精)** merges, then **Heaven (天)** and **Earth (地)**’s **true fluid (真液)** flows.
**Kan (坎)** and **Li (离)** are the **Sun (日)** and **Moon (月)**;
if humans grasp this to establish the **elixir’s foundation (丹基)**,
then the **cosmos lies within the hand (宇宙在乎手)**,
and **transformation arises from the body (万化生乎身)**—
thus the **Three Realms (三界)** return to one body.
The **Three Realms (三界)** are the **upper, middle, and lower (上中下)**,
all inherently possessed by the human body.
Using **essence (精)** achieves the **Realm of Desire (欲界)**,
using **qi (气)** achieves the **Realm of Form (色界)**,
using **spirit (神)** achieves the **Realm of Formlessness (无色界)**.

◎ The **Dragon (龙)** emerges from the **Eastern Sea (东海)**,
the **Tiger (虎)** rises from the **Western Mountain (西山)**.
The two beasts wage war in one battle,
transforming into **Heaven and Earth’s marrow (天地髓)**.
Since the **medicines (药物)** belong to **Kan (坎)** and **Li (离)**,
what are the **Dragon (龙)** and **Tiger (虎)**?
The **elixir scriptures (丹书)** blend varied names and characters,
yet they originate from one source.
For **Kan (坎)**’s **Lead (铅)** is hard to obtain,
yet easy to **devour (咥)** humans—
thus it is symbolized by the **Tiger (虎)**;
**Li (离)**’s **Mercury (汞)** is fond of **fleeing (飞)**,
yet hard to **control (控御)**—
thus it is symbolized by the **Dragon (龙)**.
The **Dragon (龙)** comes from the **Eastern Sea (东海)**,
and then **subdues the Tiger (就虎)**;
The **Tiger (虎)** rises from the **Western Mountain (西山)**,
and then **follows the Dragon (超而从龙)**.
The **elixir method (丹法)** drives the **Dragon (龙)** to subdue the **Tiger (虎)**,
and harnesses the **Tiger (虎)** to follow the **Dragon (龙)**.
Thus these two beasts **devour and are devoured (相呑相啖)**,
clashing in the **pentagon (戊己之宫)**,
then blending and merging harmoniously—
transforming into **Heaven and Earth’s marrow (天地髓)**,
and thus the **returned elixir (还丹)** may be achieved.
Indeed, **Heaven and Earth’s marrow (天地髓)** is the **essence of Kan and Li (坎离之精)**—
how could there be two?

◎ The **golden flower (金花)** blooms on **Mercury’s (汞)** leaf,
the **jade embryo (玉蒂)** grows on **Lead’s (铅)** branch.
**Kan (坎)** and **Li (离)** never separate—
**Heaven (乾)** and **Earth (坤)** endure through time.
Grasses and trees hold flowers within their leaves,
while **embryos (蒂)** grow on branches above—
all are the **marvel of yin and yang’s mutual roots (阴阳互根)**,
**intertwining and binding (相纽相结)**.
Applied to the **elixir method (丹法)**,
the **golden flower (金华)** blooms on **Mercury’s (汞)** leaf—
**yin (阴)** containing **yang (阳)**, the **symbol of Kan’s Lead (坎铅)**.
The **jade embryo (玉蒂)** is the **embryo of the hexagram wuji (己之命蒂)**—
**Yin (鄞)** and **Yang (鄂)** are its names.
The **foundation of life (命基)** cannot stand alone;
it must obtain **true Lead (真铅)** to merge with **its own Mercury (己汞)**,
then **spiritual qi (神气)** intertwines and binds,
giving birth to the **sacred embryo (圣胎)**—
thus the **jade embryo (玉蒂)** grows on **Lead’s (铅)** branch.
This marvel of **yin and yang’s mutual roots (阴阳构精)**,
**intertwining and binding (相纽相结)**,
are all the **natural workings of transformation (造化之自然)**.
The **sage (圣人)** names them **Kan (坎)** and **Li (离)**,
to reveal their **mutually concealed essence (互藏之精)**,
and symbolizes them as **Sun (日)** and **Moon (月)**,
to capture their **intermingling brilliance (交光之妙)**.

Then the **Dao of the Elixir** becomes manifest,
and one observes the **Heaven and Earth** in their appointed places,
the **Sun and Moon** in their courses,
the **day and night** in their ceaseless cycles—
not a single breath’s pause exists,
yet the **Heaven and Earth** remain unbroken.
Thus is the **eternal day of ten thousand ages** realized.
Therefore, the **Heaven and Earth** of ten thousand ages
are the **Sun and Moon** of ten thousand ages;
the **Sun and Moon** of ten thousand ages
are the **Dao of the Elixir** of ten thousand ages.
Were the **Sun and Moon** to ever halt in their motion,
all things would cease to arise,
and the **Heaven and Earth** would nearly perish—
how then could the **Elixir Body** endure its eternal vitality?

Now, who speaks of the **eternal day of ten thousand ages**?
Some interpret the **moment’s work** within the sequence
as seizing the **measure of a year**—
this reasoning falls far short of the truth.

◎ **Bathing** to avert peril, **refining and supplementing** with utmost caution.
All depends on **three ten-thousand moments**—
a single misstep risks ruin by a hair’s breadth.
When the **Moon** aligns with **Mao-Wei** (卯酉),
and **Yin and Yang’s virtue** confronts the threshold,
the method demands **bathing**.
**Bathing** is precisely what averts peril.
For **bathing** encompasses two meanings:
First, in **Mao-Wei months**, **Wood and Metal qi** flourish;
adding **Fire** risks **flight and dispersion**.
Second, in **Mao-Wei months**, **Yin and Yang qi** balance;
adding **Fire** risks **imbalance and excess**.
Thus, **bathing** and **halting Fire** avert peril.
**Refining** means extracting **Lead**,
**supplementing** means adding **Mercury**.
**Utmost caution** means advancing and retreating,
ascending and descending—
all must conform to **Heaven’s measure**.
A single thought’s deviation invites **regret and calamity**,
and the **three ten-thousand moments’** labor will be lost.
**Three ten-thousand moments** span **ten months**.
The terms **refining** and **supplementing**—
many scholars fail to grasp them;
I have already expounded them in the *Play of Mystic Hide*.

◎ When **Yin and Yang** unite in copulation,
the **Cloud-Rain Chamber** stirs with passion.
A year’s gestation yields a child—
each child born astride a crane.
The **Dao of the Golden Elixir**:
if followed, it **perfects the Sage**;
if reversed, it **forges the Elixir**.
Thus, the **Old Immortal’s** final verse
illustrates the **Cloud-Rain Chamber’s** union—
a means to make it plain to all.
Yet it is not the **worldly** union of **husband and wife**.
The **Sage** penetrates **Yin and Yang**,
and in their **mutually concealed abode**,
steals their mechanism and inverts its use.
Thus, **conception within the womb** remains unchanged,
but **emergence from the womb** defies all measure.
Yet whether **riding the Dragon** or **controlling the Crane**,
these are but **manifestations of Yang essence’s** power.
**Spirit** accomplishes all,
**Spirit** transcends all—
how can it be confined by ordinary perception or reasoning?

**Preface to the *Four Hundred Characters on Golden Elixir* with Annotations by Lü Xīxīng**
*Composed by Zhang Zǐyáng Zhēnrén of Song Tiāntái, Annotated by Lü Xīxīng of the Ming*

The **Seven Refunds and Nine Returns Golden Elixir**—seven denotes the number of fire, nine the number of metal.
To refine metal with fire, returning to the origin and restoring the essence, is called **Golden Elixir**.
Divide the body and mind into upper and lower strings,
Distinguish the spirit-*qi* at the winter and summer solstices,
Align the form and spirit with the **Kàn-Lí** (water-fire) hexagrams.
Gather the five phases:
East—**arcanum** (hún, soul) of wood,
West—**pò** (corporeal essence) of metal,
South—**shén** (spirit) of fire,
North—**jīng** (essence) of water,
Center—**yì** (intent) of earth.
Thus, the five phases converge.

To **contain the luminous gaze**, **condense the resonant breath**,
**harmonize the nasal breath**, **seal the tongue’s *qi***—
this is the **unification of the four symbols**.

When the eyes do not see yet the *arcanum* abides in the liver,
When the ears do not hear yet the essence resides in the kidneys,
When the tongue does not speak yet the spirit dwells in the heart,
When the nose does not scent yet the *pò* lingers in the lungs,
When the limbs do not move yet the intent rests in the spleen—
this is called **Five *Qi* Returning to the Primordial**.

Refine essence into *qi*,
Refine *qi* into spirit,
Refine spirit into the **Void**—
thus it is called **Three Flowers Converging at the Crown**.

When the *arcanum* is in the liver yet does not leak through the eyes,
When the *pò* is in the lungs yet does not leak through the nose,
When the spirit is in the heart yet does not leak through the mouth,
When the essence is in the kidneys yet does not leak through the ears,
When the intent is in the spleen yet does not leak through the orifices—
this is called **Leakless**.

Essence, spirit, *arcanum*, *pò*, and intent
intermingle and coalesce into one *qi*,
Invisible, inaudible, nameless—
thus it is called **Primordial Void**.

Refining essence means refining **Primordial Essence**—
not the lustful essence from carnal indulgence.
Refining *qi* means refining **Primordial *Qi***—
not the breath inhaled through mouth and nose.
Refining spirit means refining **Primordial Spirit**—
not the mental projections of heart and mind.
Thus, this **spirit, *qi*, and essence**
share the same root as Heaven and Earth,
the same body as all things.
Obtain them and live; lose them and die.

Refine with **yang fire**, and it becomes **yang *qi**;
Nourish with **yin符 (talisman)**, and it becomes **yin essence**.
Thus it is said:
*Perceived, it cannot be used;
Used, it cannot be perceived.*

The body is the **dwelling of the heart**;
The heart is the **sovereign of the body**.
When the heart rages like a dragon,
The body becomes fierce as a tiger.
Within the body lies a point of **true yang *qi***;
Within the heart lies a point of **true yin essence**.
Thus it is called **Two Substances**.

The heart belongs to **Kàn (water)**;
The body belongs to **Kūn (earth)**—
thus it is called the **Kàn-Kūn Cauldron**.

**Yang *qi*** belongs to **Lí (fire)**;
**Yin essence** belongs to **Kàn (water)**—
thus it is called **Wu-Tù (Tortoise-Hare) Medicine**.

Embrace the One, guard the Center,
Refine the Primordial, nourish the Substantial—
thus it is called **Harvesting the Primordial Mixed-Essence *Qi***.

Morning **Zhèn (thunder, ☳)**, evening **Méng (darkness, ☴)**,
Noon **Dù (midday, ☲)**, midnight **Zǐ (child, ☉)**—
thus it is called **Circulating the Fire of the Heavenly Cycle**.

Wood’s **liquid** thrives at **Mǎo (3–5 AM)**,
Metal’s **essence** thrives at **Yǒu (5–7 PM)**—
thus one must **bathe**.

**Zhèn (thunder, ☳)**-male drinks **west wine**,
**Duì (lake, ☱)**-female plucks **north blossoms**,
**Xùn (wind, ☴)**-wind stirs the six yangs,
**Kūn (earth, ☷)**-soil conceals the seven numbers—
thus one must **draw and supplement**.

At the onset of gathering medicine,
One moves the **Kàn-Kūn (water-earth) latchkey**,
Extracts the **Kàn-Lí (water-fire) blade and pill**.
Initially, like clouds filling a thousand peaks,
Then like the moon embracing ten thousand waters—
naturally like the **tortoise and serpent’s union**,
Like the **ox and horse’s pacing**.

The **Dragon contends for the *arcanum***,
The **Tiger contends for the *pò***,
The **Crow battles for essence**,
The **Hare battles for spirit**—
In the **dim haze**, true **lead** appears;
In the **obscure void**, true **mercury** emerges.

With **Yellow Nurse** as matchmaker,
Guarded in the **Central Palace**.
Lead meets fire and **ascends**,
Mercury meets fire and **flees**.
Thus, with **Non-Being as oil**, it is blended,
And with **Nameless Crude**, it is **settled**.
Lead returns to the **Kūn Palace**,
Mercury returns to the **Kàn Position**—
True earth merges, **luminous and silent**.

Excessive fire causes **dryness**,
Excessive water causes **overflow**—
Dryness and overflow must be **regulated**,
Hence the **scales and measures**.

At this stage of cultivation:
The **cinnabar field** generates wind,
The **vermilion palace** shines with moon,
The **elixir field** blazes with fire,
The **grain sea** ripples clear,
The **spine’s groove** resembles a chariot wheel,
The limbs become like mountains,
The pores open as after bathing,
The bones and vessels relax as in deep sleep,
The spirit unites like husband and wife,
The *arcanum* and *pò* cling like mother and child—
This is the **true realm**, not metaphor.

Refine with **scales and measures**,
And it **congeals without dispersing**.
Refine with **weights and balances**,
And it **coalesces ever firmer**.
The *arcanum* is hidden, the *pò* is extinguished,
Essence condenses, spirit solidifies—
One intent harmonizes, the flesh becomes **luminous and transparent**.
Day by day, hour by hour,
It **gradually congeals and gathers**,
From **formlessness to form**,
Structuring the **Sacred Embryo**.

A year has **twelve months**,
A month has **thirty days**,
A day has **one hundred *kè* (quarter-hours)**.
A month totals **three thousand *kè***,
Ten months total **thirty thousand *kè***.
In **sitting, standing, walking, resting**,
It persists **unbroken**.

Once the **embryonic *qi*** congeals,
The **infant form** manifests,
The **dark pearl** takes shape,
**Taiyi** embraces the **True**.
Within **thirty thousand *kè***,
One can **seize the thirty thousand years** of Heaven.
How so?
Each *kè* contains a **year’s seasonal shifts**.
Thus, **thirty thousand *kè*** can **seize thirty thousand years**.
Hence, a year’s **twelve months** total **thirty-six thousand**.

Even the **foolish commoner**, practicing this,
Instantly ascends to the **Sacred Realm**.
Yet the masses, in their daily lives,
Unknowingly **lose their Primordial Essence**,
**exhaust their Primordial *Qi***,
**sever their Primordial Spirit**.
Thus, every *kè* must be **harmonized**.
If even one *kè* is amiss,
The **medicinal materials decay**,
The **fire’s timing falters**.
Thus it is said:
*A hair’s breadth of deviation—no elixir is made.*
Therefore, one must **attend to each *kè***,
Yet do so **without effort**.

True *qi* congeals, the Primordial Spirit expands.
Internally, one refines **thirty thousand *kè*** of elixir in a year;

chunks.original_text: 故曰夺天地一点之阳，采日月二轮之气。 行真水于铅炉，运真火于汞鼎。 以铅见汞，名曰华池。 以汞入铅，名曰神水。 不可执于无为，不可形于有作，不可泥于存想，不可着于持守，不可枯坐灰心，不可盲修瞎炼。 ◎真土擒真铅，真铅制真汞。 铅汞归真土，身心寂不动。 夫金丹之道，无过铅、汞、土三者而已，铅即金水也，汞即木火也。 丹法五行皆以逆克而成妙用，故以土檎铅，以铅制汞，相呑相啖，死归厚土，而后金丹始成。 真土者，己土也。 上阳子曰：「用己土克水以求铅，是也。 盖真铅之气，隐于二八之门，吾乘其爻动而取之若无己土，则感应相与之意乖，而药终不可得矣。 大修行人必须辨取真心于此，真心出一真意，旋曲而侦之，审密而求之，濡弱以下之，乃其肯綮，则参同契所谓管括微密。 开舒布宝。 」实求铅之要诀也。 然谓之真者，取无二无杂之意，盖铅既真铅，而土非真土，则不能以真摄真，而邪秽非道矣。 及乎得药归鼎，即吾一身之阴汞，自然制伏，招铅而不飞不走，何者火为水灭，木受金伐，自然之道无足异者。 参同契云：「水盛火消灭，俱死归厚土。 」盖五行之妙，水得土则掩，火得土则藏，万物非土不生，故丹法以归土为究竟。 长养圣胎，圆就丹药，无出乎此，然归土则身与心 皆寂然不动矣，身与心上下两弦气也，序云，以身心分上下，两弦金丹之道，以动为用，以静为体，寂然不动则静矣，故此以下遂言归静之妙。 ◎虚无生白雪，寂静发黄芽。 玉炉火温温，金鼎飞紫霞。 虚无寂静，不动之极也，「白雪黄芽」，皆丹药之异名。 盖「白雪」者阴之精，「黄芽」则铅之萌蘗也。 参同契云，「阴火白，黄芽铅」。 盖一当身心不动之际，丹在中宫，但见和气春融，生机活溌，穰穰焉如白雪之飞于虚空，茁茁焉如黄芽之萌于土壤。 此时用火工夫不宜太燥，但当养之以温温，存之以绵绵。 如我圣师所言：「丹灶河东休矻矻，鹤胎龟息自绵绵」者。 至于鼎上霞飞，则阳光冲顶，喻以外丹炉火，取其易晓耳。 ◎华池莲花开，神水金波静。 夜深月正明，天地一轮镜。 华池神水，说者非一。 古歌云：「命基只在金华池」令以悟真之语参之，「华池莲花开」即少女初开北地花也。 「神水」者，己之真汞也。 波浄水澄、静定之极也。 「夜深月正明」者，夜半蟾光北海明也。 夜深者，亥子之交，冬至之侯也。 「天地一轮镜」，明莹之极也。 盖药必气足而后生，静定而后采。 当其金精壮盛，月华莹浄之时，金莲半绽，药苗正新。 于此采之，要惟守之以恬淡，先之以不争，是谓水澄波浄，然后可以鉴映万象，而骊龙之珠可得。 不然则有动于中，必揺其精，凶害悔吝，由之以生，而药终不可得矣。 ◎朱砂炼阳气，水银烹金精。 金精与阳气，朱砂而水银。 朱砂水银皆丹之别名。 言朱砂者，乃所炼之阳气也。 水银者，乃所烹之金精也。 盖丹凭火化，故二六时中，以阳火炼之，则成阳气。 而朱砂者，即阳气之所结也，以阴符养之，则成阴精。 而水银者，即阴精之所成也。 然金精阳气一而已矣。 故总括之云：「金精与阳气。 朱砂而水银」。 是知一物两体，必非判然可分为二者，但随火符而变耳。

「Therefore, it is said: **Seize the Yang** of a single point from Heaven and Earth,
And **harvest the Qi** of the two wheels of Sun and Moon.

**Circulate the True Water** in the Lead Furnace,
And **move the True Fire** in the Mercury Tripod.

When Lead encounters Mercury,
It is called the **Flowering Pool**.
When Mercury enters Lead,
It is called **Divine Water**.

One must not **cling to inaction**,
Nor **manifest in overt action**,
Nor **fixate on visualization**,
Nor **obsessionally adhere to retention**,
Nor **sit in vain and lose resolve**,
Nor **practice blindly and refine recklessly**.

**True Earth subdues True Lead**,
And **True Lead restrains True Mercury**.
When Lead and Mercury **return to True Earth**,
The body and mind **become still and unmoved**.

The Dao of the Golden Elixir
Has no other principle than Lead, Mercury, and Earth—
Lead is the **True Water of Metal**,
Mercury is the **True Fire of Wood**.

The methods of the Elixir **reverse the Five Phases** to achieve wondrous effects,
Thus, Earth **subdues Lead**,
And Lead **restrains Mercury**,
**Devouring and being devoured**,
All **die and return to the thick Earth**,
And only then does the Golden Elixir **begin to take form**.

**True Earth** refers to the **Earth of the Self**.
The Master of Upper Yang said:
*"To **subdue Water** and seek Lead with the **Earth of the Self**—this is correct.
For the **Qi of True Lead** is concealed within the **Gate of the Twenty-Eight**,
And I **ride its movement** to take it.
If there is no **Earth of the Self**,
Then the **resonance and response** will be misaligned,
And the **medicinal material** will never be obtained.*

The **true adept** must **discern and extract the True Mind** here.
When the **True Mind** issues forth a **True Intent**,
**Twisting and probing** it,
**Searching and refining** it,
**Nurturing it with gentleness**,
This is the **pith and marrow**—
As the *Paramartha Contract* says:
*"**Embrace the subtle and profound**,
**Unfold and reveal the treasure**."*

This is the **essential key** to seeking Lead.

Yet, when it is called **True**,
It is taken in the sense of **unadulterated and pure**.
If Lead is **True Lead** but Earth is not **True Earth**,
Then **True cannot contain True**,
And **impurity cannot align with the Dao**.

When the **medicinal material is obtained** and **returned to the Tripod**,
It is the **Mercury of my own Yin**,
Naturally **subdued and controlled**,
**Summoning Lead** yet **neither scattering nor fleeing**—
For what reason?
Fire is extinguished by Water,
Wood is subdued by Metal—
These are the **natural ways** of no great wonder.

The *Paramartha Contract* states:
*"When Water is excessive, Fire is extinguished—annihilation.
All return to the thick Earth."*

The **wondrous interplay of the Five Phases** is such:
Water meets Earth and is **smothered**,
Fire meets Earth and is **concealed**.
All things **cannot be born without Earth**,
Thus the Elixir method **culminates in returning to Earth**.

**Nourishing the Holy Fetus**,
**Perfecting the Elixir**,
Has no other path than this.
Yet when **returning to Earth**,
The body and mind **both become still and unmoved**—
For the **body and mind** are the **two strings** of **Yin and Yang Qi**,
As the *Canon* says:
*"Divide the body and mind into upper and lower,
The two strings are the Dao of the Golden Elixir—
**Movement** is its **function**,
**Stillness** is its **substance**.
When **still and unmoved**, it is **stillness**—
Thus, from here onward, the **mysteries of returning to stillness** are spoken of."*

**Emptiness and Nothingness** generate **White Snow**,
**Stillness and Quietude** sprout **Yellow Sprouts**.
The **Jade Furnace** warms with **gentle Fire**,
The **Golden Tripod** ascends **Purple Mist**.

**Emptiness and stillness**—
The **peak of immobility**—
**"White Snow"** and **"Yellow Sprouts"** are both **alternate names for the Elixir**.
For **"White Snow"** is the **essence of Yin**,
And **"Yellow Sprouts"** are the **emerging vitality of Lead**,
As the *Paramartha Contract* says:
*"Yin Fire is white,
Yellow Sprouts are Lead."*

When the body and mind are **still and unmoved**,
The Elixir resides in the **Central Palace**,
And only **harmonious Qi** of spring warmth is seen—
**Vitality and movement** flourish abundantly,
Like **White Snow** drifting in the **void**,
Like **Yellow Sprouts** bursting from the **soil**.
At this time, the **refinement of Fire** must not be too **dry**,
But should **nurture it gently**,
And **preserve it softly**.

As our **Holy Master** spoke:
*"The Elixir furnace of the River East rests in **tranquility**,
The **Fetus of the Crane** and the **Breath of the Tortoise** naturally **soften**."*

As for the **mists ascending the Tripod**,
It is the **Yang Light striking the crown**—
A metaphor for **external Elixir** using the **furnace’s fire**,
Easily understood.

**Flowering Pool blooms the Lotus**,
**Divine Water** stirs **Golden Waves**.
The night is deep, the moon is bright and clear—
**Heaven and Earth** as a **single wheel of mirror**.

**Flowering Pool** and **Divine Water** have many interpretations.
An ancient verse says:
*"The **foundation of life** lies only in the **Golden Flowering Pool**."*
Now, applying the words of **enlightenment**,
**"Flowering Pool blooms the Lotus"** refers to the **virgin maiden’s first bloom** in the **Northern Land**.
**"Divine Water"** is the **True Mercury of the Self**.
**"Golden Waves"**—
The **ultimate clarity of water and stillness**.

**"The night is deep, the moon is bright and clear"**—
At the **midnight hour**, the **moonlight shines** in the **Northern Sea**.
**"Deep night"** is the **juncture of Hài and Zǐ**,
The **time of the Winter Solstice**.
**"Heaven and Earth as a single wheel of mirror"**—
The **peak of luminous purity**.

For the **medicinal material** must first **be rich in Qi** before it is **born**,
And **still and settled** before it is **harvested**.
When the **Metal Essence is robust and flourishing**,
And the **Moon’s Radiance** is **clear and pure**,
The **Golden Lotus** half-unfolds,
The **Elixir Sprout** is fresh and new.
To **harvest it at this moment**,
One must **guard it with serenity**,
And **prioritize it with non-contention**—
This is called **clear water and pure waves**,
And only then can it **reflect all phenomena**,
And the **Pearl of the Tortoise** be obtained.

Otherwise, if there is **disturbance within**,
The **essence will scatter**,
And **calamity, regret, and remorse** will arise from it,
And the **medicinal material** will never be obtained.

**Cinnabar refines the Yang Qi**,
**Quick-silver cooks the Metal Essence**.
The **Metal Essence** and the **Yang Qi**—
**Cinnabar** and **Quick-silver**—
Are both **alternate names for the Elixir**.
When speaking of **"Cinnabar"**, it is the **Yang Qi** being refined.
When speaking of **"Quick-silver"**, it is the **Metal Essence** being cooked.
For the Elixir **relies on Fire** to transform,
Thus, in the **twelve double-hours**,
When **Yang Fire** refines it,
It becomes **Yang Qi**.
And **"Cinnabar"** is where the **Yang Qi** **congeals**.
When **Yin Symbols** nurture it,
It becomes **Yin Essence**.
And **"Quick-silver"** is where the **Yin Essence** **forms**.
Yet the **Metal Essence** and the **Yang Qi** are **one and the same**.

Thus, it is summarized:
*"The **Metal Essence** and the **Yang Qi**—
**Cinnabar** and **Quick-silver**."*

Now it is known:
**One substance in two forms**,
Which cannot be **clearly divided** into two—
Only **according to the Fire and Symbols** does it **shift**.

chunks.original_text: 序云：「以阳火炼之，则成阳气，以阴符养之，则成阴精。 」意盖如此。 ◎日魂玉兔脂, 月魄金乌髓。 衿来归鼎中，化作一泓水。 阴阳之精，互藏其宅，故曰之魂，太阳之精也，为玉兔之脂，即坎之中爻，真铅是也。 月之魄，太阴之质也，为金乌之髓，即离之中爻，真汞是也。 是曰乌兔药物二者，掇归鼎内，则解化为水，而成金液。 参同契云：「解化为水，马齿琅玕」是也。 盖药之始生，无过一气升于甑山，则化而为水，先液后凝，还丹乃就。 诸书所谓玉浆甘露，灌顶醍醐，皆不出此。 ◎药物生玄窍、火候发阳炉。 龙虎交会罢、宝鼎产玄珠。 如上指陈药物火候，既已详明。 仙翁恐人不知交结之处，故复示此一窍。 其意旨则见序中。 序云：「身中一窍，名曰玄牝，非心非肾、非口鼻也。 非脾胃也，非谷道也，非膀胱也，非丹田也，非泥丸也。 能知此之一窍，则冬至在此矣，药物在此矣，火候亦在此矣，沐浴亦在此矣，结胎亦在此矣，脱体亦在此矣。 夫此一窍，亦无辺傍，亦无内外，乃神气之根，虚无之谷。 则在身中求之，不可求于他也。 」如此指示，可谓言约而意尽矣。 ◎此窍非凡窍、乾坤共合成。 名为神气穴、内有坎离精。 「或问何谓药物。 曰：药者坎中真乙之气，真铅是也、」物者，离中久积之精，真汞是也。 道德经云：「恍恍惚惚，其中之物」。 是物之谓也。 「窈窈冥冥，其中有精。 其精甚真，其中有信。 」是药之谓也。 夫药物生于窈冥恍惚之中，而曰生于玄窍何也。 曰阴阳之宅，真精互藏。 此时龙虎未交，玄牝未立。 故尚属之两家。 既归一处，则神气自然，归乎其根。 而虚无之中，成此一窍，名曰玄牝。 于中药物，日滋月长，真至三百功圆脱胎神化，皆不外此。 故曰结胎在此，脱体在此。 问火候冬至何以在此。 曰：火候者，周天卦数也。 周遭环匝皆在此处。 冬至在此者，晦至朔旦。 震来受符，阳炉发火，皆在于此。 然非他家之冬至也。 故曰则在身中求之，不可求之于他。 仙翁立言深有意味言则在教人始认取身中，言不可求之于他，见他处亦有求之之时。 ◎木汞一点红、金铅四斤黑。 铅汞结成珠、耿耿紫金色。 木汞者，已之灵汞也，无有铢两，故言一点。 上阳子云：「就近便处运一点真汞以迎之」是也。 金铅者，坎中真乙之水，水中产金，故曰日金铅。 言三斤者，四十八两。 毎两真铅三铢，共计一百四十四铢，乃坤之策数也。 盖金铅全体未破，铢两完足，乃有此数。 丹砂者，金液还丹之别名。 紫者红黑相合之色。 参同契云：「色转更为紫，赫然成还丹」。 耿耿者，即赫然之意。 夫金丹乃无质之质，非可以色相求者。 仙翁因方弁色，反象示人，要在得乎言意之表。 若必求所谓「耿耿紫金」者，而后谓之丹，则痴人说梦，失之远矣。 ◎家园景物丽、风雨正春深。 犁锄不费カ、大地皆黄金。 「家园」者，以自己身中而言。 「景物丽」言药物全也。 「风雨春深」，火候足也。 夫得药归鼎，抱一守中，要皆和以无为之油，镇以无名之璞，故虽有犂锄，无劳费力。 至于功成药化，则大地变为黄金。 大地者，亦指吾身而言。 如血化白膏，骨如琼玉，阴尽阳纯，改形易质。 丈六金身，万劫不坏，岂虚语哉。

The **Moon’s shadow** is the **marrow of the Golden Crow**.
When gathered into the **Cauldron**, they merge as **one pool of water**.
For the **precise essences of Yin and Yang** intermingle within,
Thus it is said: *"The soul"*—the **essence of the Great Yang**—
Is the **fat of the Jade Rabbit**, the **central line of Kan**,
Which is **true lead**.

The **Moon’s shadow**—the **substance of Great Yin**—
Is the **marrow of the Golden Crow**, the **central line of Li**,
Which is **true mercury**.

Thus, the **two medicines of Crow and Rabbit**,
When gathered into the **Cauldron**, dissolve into **water**,
And become the **Golden Elixir**.
As the *Paramartha Agreement* says:
*"Dissolving into water, the horse-tooth lapis."*

Indeed, the **medicine’s origin** knows no greater than **one breath ascending from the steamer-mountain**,
Then transforming into **water**—first as **liquid**, then congealing—
And thus the **Returning Elixir** is complete.
All texts speak of **Jade Nectar and Sweet Dew**,
**Bathing the Crown with Curdled Milk**—
None exceed this.

◎ The **medicine’s birth** lies in the **Mysterious Aperture**,
The **fire’s timing** ignites the **Yang Furnace**.
When **Dragon and Tiger** cease their union,
The **Treasure Cauldron** births the **Mysterious Pearl**.

As above, the **medicine and fire’s timing** have been clearly expounded.
The **Immortal Sage** feared others might not grasp their **interaction**,
Thus further revealing this **one aperture**.
Its meaning is already seen in the sequence:

*"Within the body, there is one aperture called the **Mysterious Female**—
Not the heart, not the kidneys,
Not the mouth or nose,
Not the spleen or stomach,
Not the anal passage or bladder,
Nor the **Elixir Field** or **Mud Ball**.
To know this **one aperture** is to know the **Winter Solstice** within,
The **medicine** within,
The **fire’s timing** within,
The **bathing** within,
The **gestation** within,
The **shedding of the body** within.

This **one aperture** has no boundaries, no inside or outside—
It is the **root of spirit-qi** and the **valley of emptiness**.
Thus, seeking it within the body,
One must not seek it elsewhere."*

Such instruction is concise yet exhaustive.

◎ This **aperture** is no ordinary one—
It is the **union of Heaven and Earth**, formed together.
Named the **Spirit-Qi Cavity**,
Within it dwell the **essences of Kan and Li**.

The **medicine** is the **true Yin-Yi qi of Kan**—**true lead**.
The **substance** is the **long-accumulated essence of Li**—**true mercury**."*

*"Faint and indistinct, yet within it lies the **substance**."*
This refers to the **substance**.

Its essence is most true, within it lies the **verity**."*
This refers to the **medicine**.

The **medicine and substance** arise from the **dark and indistinct**,
Yet it is said they arise from the **Mysterious Aperture**—
For the **dwellings of Yin and Yang** hold their **true essences** intermingled.
At this time, **Dragon and Tiger** have not yet united,
The **Mysterious Female** has not yet formed.
Thus, they still belong to **two families**.
Once gathered in one place,
The **spirit-qi** naturally returns to its **root**,
And within the **void**, this **one aperture**—the **Mysterious Female**—emerges.
Within it, the **medicine and substance** grow daily and monthly,
Until at **three hundred cycles**, the **transformation is complete**—
**gestation, shedding the body, divine metamorphosis**—
All stem from this.
Thus it is said: *"Gestation is here, shedding the body is here."*

When asked why the **fire’s timing** and **Winter Solstice** are within,
It is said: *"The **fire’s timing** is the **circuit of Heaven’s numbers**,
The **surrounding revolutions** are all within this place.
The **Winter Solstice** is here—from **obscurity to dawn**,
When **Thunder arrives to receive the Symbols**,
The **Yang Furnace** ignites—
All occur within this.
Yet this is not the **Winter Solstice** of others.
Thus it is said: *‘Seek it within the body, not elsewhere.’*
The **Immortal Sage’s words** carry deep meaning—
Saying *‘seek it within’* teaches one to **first recognize it in the body**,
Saying *‘not elsewhere’* shows that **seeking it elsewhere** is also possible at times."

◎ **One point of Wood Mercury** glows red,
**Four catties of Gold Lead** are black.
When **Lead and Mercury** coalesce into a **pearl**,
It shines **bright and wondrous—wisteria gold**.

**Wood Mercury** is the **spirit of the previous cycle’s mercury**,
With not even a **dram’s weight**, hence *"one point."*
The **Upper Yang Master** said:
*"Take a **nearby true mercury** to welcome it."*
**Gold Lead** is the **true Yin-Yi water of Kan**,
From which **gold is born in water**, hence *"day-gold lead."*
Speaking of **three catties** means **forty-eight taels**.
Each **tael of true lead** weighs **three chins**—
Totaling **one hundred forty-four chins**,
The **strategy number of Kun**.

For **Gold Lead’s** complete form remains unbroken,
Its **chins and taels** are whole—
Thus this count.
**Cinnabar** is another name for the **Returning Elixir’s Golden Liquid**.
**Wisteria** is the color of **red and black combined**.
The *Paramartha Agreement* says:
*"Its hue shifts to wisteria, then **brightly becomes the Returning Elixir**."*
**Bright and wondrous** is the same as *"brightly."*
The **Golden Elixir** is the **substance without substance**,
Not to be sought by **form or appearance**.
The **Immortal Sage**, through **prescriptions and symbols**, reverses the analogy to guide others—
The intent lies beyond the **words and meaning**.
If one insists on seeking the so-called *"bright wisteria gold"*
Before calling it **Elixir**, then such a person speaks in **dreams**,

chunks.original_text: 震兑坎离者，四象之卦也。 东西南北者，四象之位也。 作丹之时、攒簇五行，和合四象，而归于中宫，则东西南北混合为一矣。 故金不在西。 木不在东。 火不居南，水不居北。 既无卦爻，亦无方位，忘形罔象，不可致诘，而名之曰丹。 然其要在于以斗柄而运周天，火侯数足，然后混合之功可成。 盖天以北斗鲜酌元气，周天运转，夫是以五气顺布而成岁功，人亦有之。 苟或不能「观天之道，执天之行」，求吾人之所谓辰极者执而运之，焉能攒簇混合而成真乙之丹乎。 ◎火候不须时、冬至岂在子。 及其沐浴法、卯酉时虚比。 金丹火侯，自子以后六时为阳，自午以后六时为阴。 至于亥子之交，一阳来复，名为冬至。 卯酉之月，木金气旺，法当沐浴。 当此盖阴阳之定理，造化之成数，有不可以毫发差殊者。 然法虽死定，理实圆活，运移之妙，存乎一心。 故入药起火自有进退，不用子午也。 震来受符，自有真信，不在子月也。 沐浴金丹，至有时节，不在卯酉也。 入药镜云：「一日内，十二时； 意所到，皆可为。 」又云：「初结胎，看本命； 终脱胎，看四正。 」此足相发明矣。 ◎乌肝与兔髓、擒来共一处。 一粒复一粒、从微而至着。 乌肝兔髓，坎离之精也，是必擒归一处而后金丹始成。 及乎火运周天，功圆三百，是谓日复一粒，从微至者，婴儿显相，而脱胎神化矣。 ◎混沌包虚空、虚空括三界。 及寻其根源、一粒黍米大。 三界者，欲界色界无色界也，三者皆括于虚空之中，而混沌包之。 混沌者，先天无极也。 丹法神气归根虚无生窍，能以无质之中而生灵质，是虚空括三界也。 脱胎之后，莫不以返于虚无，归于混沌，而后谓之了当，是混沌包虚空也。 然而求其立命之根源，则亦不过一黍玄珠，从微至着耳。 盖黍米之珠，乃无中之有，脱胎神化，复归于无，则圣不可知，而与道为之合真矣。 ◎天地交真液、日月含真精。 会得坎离基、三界归一身。 天地者，阴阳配合之体也，日月者，阴阳互藏之精也，天地交则日月之精合矣，真精合则天地之液行矣。 坎离即日月也，人能会此以立丹基，则宇宙在乎手，万化生乎身，而三界归于一身矣。 三界即上意，皆人身所自有者。 以精用者，则成欲界，以气用者，则成色界。 以神用者，则成无色界。 ◎龙从东海来、虎向西山起。 两兽战一场、化作天地髓。 药物既属坎离，龙虎复为何物。 丹书异名殊字融通，实出一原。 盖坎铅难得，而易于咥人，故象之以虎； 离汞好飞，而难于控御，故象之以龙。 龙从东海来，来而就虎也； 虎从西山起，超而从龙也。 丹法驱龙就虎，驾虎从龙，故此两兽相呑相啖，交战于戊己之宫，则混合和融，化为天地之髓，而还丹可成矣。 其实天地之髓，即坎离之精也，岂有二哉。 ◎金花开汞叶、玉蒂长铅枝。 坎离不曾间、乾坤经几时。 草木花含叶中，蒂生枝上，是皆阴阳互根，相纽相结之妙。 比之丹法，则金华开于汞叶，阴中含阳，坎铅之象也。 玉蒂者，己之命蒂，鄞鄂是也。 命基不能自立，必得真铅合以己汞，然后神气交结而生圣胎，故玉蒂长于铅枝。 惟此阴阳构精，相纽相结，要皆造化之自然。 圣人名之坎离，以泄其互藏之精，象之日月，以取其交光之妙。

The **Zhen (震)** and **Dui (兑)**, **Kan (坎)** and **Li (离)**—these are the four **symbols (象)** of the **Dao (道)**.
East, west, south, north—these are the four **symbols'** positions (位)**.
When crafting the **elixir (丹)**, gather and compress the **Five Phases (五行)**, harmonize the four **symbols**, and return them to the **Central Palace (中宫)**, then east, west, south, and north blend into one.
Thus, **Metal (金)** does not dwell in the west,
**Wood (木)** does not dwell in the east,
**Fire (火)** does not dwell in the south,
**Water (水)** does not dwell in the north.
When neither **hexagram (卦)** nor **trigram (爻)** exists, nor their respective positions,
and one forgets form and obscures symbol,
it cannot be sought or questioned—
yet it is named the **elixir (丹)**.
But its essence lies in using the **Big Dipper’s handle (斗柄)** to traverse the **Celestial Cycle (周天)**,
with **Fire’s conditions (火侯)** fully observed,
then the blending and compression may be achieved.

For the **Celestial Cycle (周天)** is governed by the **Big Dipper (北斗)**, which distributes the **original qi (元气)**.
As the **Celestial Cycle** revolves, the **Five Qi (五气)** flow in sequence, completing the year’s work.
Humans also possess this.
If one cannot *"observe the Dao of Heaven (观天之道), grasp Heaven’s movements (执天之行)"*,
and instead seeks the **human gathering and compression (攒簇)**—the **so-called Celestial Pivot (辰极)**—
how can one compress and blend to produce the **true elixir of immortality (真乙之丹)**?

◎ **Fire’s conditions (火侯)** do not require set times,
nor does the **winter solstice (冬至)** necessarily fall on **zi hour (子)**.
In the **bathing method (沐浴法)**, at **mao (卯)** and **you (酉)** hours, the **empty comparison (虚比)** occurs.
For the **elixir’s Fire’s conditions (金丹火侯)**,
the twelve hours from **zi (子)** onward are **yang (阳)**,
and the twelve hours from **wu (午)** onward are **yin (阴)**.
When **hai (亥)** and **zi (子)** hours meet,
one **yang** returns—this is called the **winter solstice (冬至)**.
In the months of **mao (卯)** and **you (酉)**,
**Wood (木)** and **Metal (金)** qi flourish,
and the **bathing method (沐浴)** should be applied.
At this point, the **principles of yin and yang (阴阳之定理)** and the **numbers of transformation (造化之成数)**
must not differ by even a hair’s breadth.
Yet though the **method (法)** is fixed,
the **principles (理)** are boundless and flexible—
its subtleties lie in the practitioner’s mind.
Thus, the **administration of medicines (入药)** and the **ignition of fire (起火)** have their own advances and retreats;
one need not adhere strictly to **zi (子)** and **wu (午)** hours.
When **Zhen (震)** arrives and receives its **talisman (符)**,
there is **true faith (真信)**—
not confined to the month of **zi (子)**.
When bathing in the **elixir’s Fire’s conditions (金丹)**,
at the proper time and season,
it is not confined to **mao (卯)** and **you (酉)** months.
The **medicine administration (入药)** states:
*"Within one day, twelve hours;
Where the mind reaches, all may be done."*
It also says:
*"At the initial embryo formation, examine one’s natal **command (本命)**;
At the final **shedding of the mortal frame (脱胎)**, observe the **four cardinal directions (四正)**."*
This fully elucidates the matter.

when seized, they are found in one place.
One **elixir grain (一粒)** follows another,
from the subtle to the manifest.
**Crow’s liver (乌肝)** and **rabbit’s marrow (兔髓)** are the **essence of Kan and Li (坎离之精)**;
they must be seized and returned to one place
before the **golden elixir (金丹)** can be formed.
When **Fire’s conditions (火)** traverse the **Celestial Cycle (周天)**,
and the work is complete after **three hundred days (三百)**,
this is called **one grain per day (日复一粒)**—
from the subtle to the manifest.

the **void (虚无)** gives rise to **orifices (生窍)**,
and within the **formless (无质)** arises **sacred substance (灵质)**—
this is the **void** encompassing the **Three Realms**.
After **shedding of the mortal frame (脱胎)**,
all return to the **void (虚无)**,
to **Chaos (混沌)**,
and are then called **accomplished (了当)**—
this is **Chaos** embracing the **void**.

it is still just a **grain-sized Dark Pearl (一黍玄珠)**,
from the subtle to the manifest.
For the **grain of millet (黍米)**,
it is the **having within the none (无中之有)**;
when **shedding of the mortal frame (脱胎)** achieves **spiritual transformation (神化)**,
it returns once more to the **none (无)**—
then the **sage (圣人)** is beyond knowing,
and the **Way (道)** is truly united.

when **Sun (日)** and **Moon (月)** contain **true essence (真精)**.
If one grasps the **foundation of Kan and Li (坎离基)**,
then the **Three Realms (三界)** return to one body.

all inherently possessed by the human body.

using **qi (气)** achieves the **Realm of Form (色界)**,
using **spirit (神)** achieves the **Realm of Formlessness (无色界)**.

◎ The **Dragon (龙)** emerges from the **Eastern Sea (东海)**,
the **Tiger (虎)** rises from the **Western Mountain (西山)**.
The two beasts wage war in one battle,
transforming into **Heaven and Earth’s marrow (天地髓)**.
Since the **medicines (药物)** belong to **Kan (坎)** and **Li (离)**,
what are the **Dragon (龙)** and **Tiger (虎)**?
The **elixir scriptures (丹书)** blend varied names and characters,
yet they originate from one source.
For **Kan (坎)**’s **Lead (铅)** is hard to obtain,
yet easy to **devour (咥)** humans—
thus it is symbolized by the **Tiger (虎)**;
**Li (离)**’s **Mercury (汞)** is fond of **fleeing (飞)**,
yet hard to **control (控御)**—
thus it is symbolized by the **Dragon (龙)**.

and then **subdues the Tiger (就虎)**;

and then **follows the Dragon (超而从龙)**.

and harnesses the **Tiger (虎)** to follow the **Dragon (龙)**.
Thus these two beasts **devour and are devoured (相呑相啖)**,
clashing in the **pentagon (戊己之宫)**,
then blending and merging harmoniously—
transforming into **Heaven and Earth’s marrow (天地髓)**,
and thus the **returned elixir (还丹)** may be achieved.
Indeed, **Heaven and Earth’s marrow (天地髓)** is the **essence of Kan and Li (坎离之精)**—

◎ The **golden flower (金花)** blooms on **Mercury’s (汞)** leaf,
the **jade embryo (玉蒂)** grows on **Lead’s (铅)** branch.
**Kan (坎)** and **Li (离)** never separate—
**Heaven (乾)** and **Earth (坤)** endure through time.
Grasses and trees hold flowers within their leaves,
while **embryos (蒂)** grow on branches above—
all are the **marvel of yin and yang’s mutual roots (阴阳互根)**,
**intertwining and binding (相纽相结)**.
Applied to the **elixir method (丹法)**,
the **golden flower (金华)** blooms on **Mercury’s (汞)** leaf—
**yin (阴)** containing **yang (阳)**, the **symbol of Kan’s Lead (坎铅)**.

**Yin (鄞)** and **Yang (鄂)** are its names.
The **foundation of life (命基)** cannot stand alone;
it must obtain **true Lead (真铅)** to merge with **its own Mercury (己汞)**,
then **spiritual qi (神气)** intertwines and binds,
giving birth to the **sacred embryo (圣胎)**—
thus the **jade embryo (玉蒂)** grows on **Lead’s (铅)** branch.
This marvel of **yin and yang’s mutual roots (阴阳构精)**,
**intertwining and binding (相纽相结)**,
are all the **natural workings of transformation (造化之自然)**.
The **sage (圣人)** names them **Kan (坎)** and **Li (离)**,
to reveal their **mutually concealed essence (互藏之精)**,
and symbolizes them as **Sun (日)** and **Moon (月)**,
to capture their **intermingling brilliance (交光之妙)**.

chunks.original_text: 然后丹法大明，即观天地设位，日月运行，昼夜循环，无有一息之间暇，而乾坤不毁。 万古一日者，实由于此。 故万古此乾坤，则万古此日月； 万古此日月，则万古此丹法。 使日月有时而停玑，则万物不生，而乾坤或几乎息矣，丹体何由而常灵常存哉。 今几时言万古一日也。 或以序中一刻之功夫，可夺天地一年之数为解者，于义差远。 ◎沐浴防危险、抽添自谨持。 都来三万刻、差失恐毫厘。 夫月当卯酉刑德临门，法宜沐浴。 沐浴者，正所以防危险也。 盖沐浴之说，兼有二义：一者卯酉之月，木金气旺，加之以火，则有飞走之虞； 二者卯酉之月，阴阳气平，加之以火，则有偏重之患。 故沐浴停火，以防危险。 抽者抽铅，添者添汞。 自谨持者，进退升降，务合天度。 一念少差，则悔吝为贼，而三万刻之功亏矣。 三万刻乃十月也。 抽添二字，学者多不能晓，予已着之玄肤论中。 ◎夫妇交会时、洞房云雨作。 一载生个儿、个个会骑鹤。 金丹之道，顺则成人，逆则成丹。 故仙翁篇末，以洞房夫妇之事明之。 要在使人易晓，然非。 世法之所谓洞房夫妇也。 圣人洞晓阴阳，故于互藏之宅，盗其机而逆用之。 故懐胎则十月无殊，脱胎则万变莫测。 要之乘龙控鹤，皆阳精之所显化。 神无不为，神无不通，又乌可以寻常识见思议之哉。

are the **Dao of the Elixir** of ten thousand ages.
Were the **Sun and Moon** to ever halt in their motion,
all things would cease to arise,
and the **Heaven and Earth** would nearly perish—
how then could the **Elixir Body** endure its eternal vitality?

Now, who speaks of the **eternal day of ten thousand ages**?
Some interpret the **moment’s work** within the sequence
as seizing the **measure of a year**—
this reasoning falls far short of the truth.

◎ **Bathing** to avert peril, **refining and supplementing** with utmost caution.
All depends on **three ten-thousand moments**—
a single misstep risks ruin by a hair’s breadth.
When the **Moon** aligns with **Mao-Wei** (卯酉),
and **Yin and Yang’s virtue** confronts the threshold,
the method demands **bathing**.
**Bathing** is precisely what averts peril.
For **bathing** encompasses two meanings:
First, in **Mao-Wei months**, **Wood and Metal qi** flourish;
adding **Fire** risks **flight and dispersion**.
Second, in **Mao-Wei months**, **Yin and Yang qi** balance;
adding **Fire** risks **imbalance and excess**.
Thus, **bathing** and **halting Fire** avert peril.
**Refining** means extracting **Lead**,
**supplementing** means adding **Mercury**.
**Utmost caution** means advancing and retreating,
ascending and descending—
all must conform to **Heaven’s measure**.
A single thought’s deviation invites **regret and calamity**,
and the **three ten-thousand moments’** labor will be lost.
**Three ten-thousand moments** span **ten months**.
The terms **refining** and **supplementing**—
many scholars fail to grasp them;
I have already expounded them in the *Play of Mystic Hide*.

◎ When **Yin and Yang** unite in copulation,
the **Cloud-Rain Chamber** stirs with passion.
A year’s gestation yields a child—
each child born astride a crane.
The **Dao of the Golden Elixir**:
if followed, it **perfects the Sage**;
if reversed, it **forges the Elixir**.
Thus, the **Old Immortal’s** final verse
illustrates the **Cloud-Rain Chamber’s** union—
a means to make it plain to all.
Yet it is not the **worldly** union of **husband and wife**.
The **Sage** penetrates **Yin and Yang**,
and in their **mutually concealed abode**,
steals their mechanism and inverts its use.
Thus, **conception within the womb** remains unchanged,
but **emergence from the womb** defies all measure.
Yet whether **riding the Dragon** or **controlling the Crane**,
these are but **manifestations of Yang essence’s** power.
**Spirit** accomplishes all,
**Spirit** transcends all—
how can it be confined by ordinary perception or reasoning?
